trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for value setters.
trans-unit.target: 表示值 setter 的基类。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether this object is read-only and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 检查此对象是否是只读的不能更改。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.SetterBase> must call this method before applying any changes to the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Windows.SetterBase>必须将任何更改应用于对象的状态之前调用此方法。</xref:System.Windows.SetterBase>

trans-unit.source: If the object is read-only and you try to modify the state of the object, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是只读的并且尝试来修改对象的状态，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this object is in an immutable state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此对象是否为不可变状态。

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `true` and you try to modify the state of this object, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性返回`true`和尝试来修改此对象的状态，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object is in an immutable state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>此对象是否为不可变状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
